text: Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it: {{MULTI}}

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Curiosity
multi.hover: The desire to know more about the world

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Responsibility
multi.hover: Taking ownership of one’s actions and understanding the consequences of those actions for oneself and others

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Flexibility
multi.hover: Adapting to situations, expectations, or demands

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Engagement
multi.hover: A sense of investment involvement in learning

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Openness
multi.hover: Willingness to consider new ways of being and thinking in the world

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Creativity
multi.hover: Using new approaches to generate, investigate, and represent ideas

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Persistence
multi.hover: Sustaining interest in and attention to short- and long-term projects

multi.text:
Rate the importance, if any, of the following habit of mind to your current or upcoming academic writing task in the course for which you’re using this app, as you see it:
Metacognition
multi.hover: The ability to reflect on one’s own thinking as well as on the individual and cultural processes used to structure knowledge
